013package org.apache.juneau.objecttools;
014
015import static java.util.Calendar.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.StateMachineState.*;
017
018import java.text.*;
019import java.util.*;
020
021import org.apache.juneau.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
023
024/**
025 * Date/time matcher factory for the {@link ObjectSearcher} class.
026 *
027 * <p>
028 *    The class provides searching based on the following patterns:
029 * </p>
030 * <ul>
031 *    <li><js>"property=2011"</js> - A single year
032 *    <li><js>"property=2011 2013 2015"</js> - Multiple years
033 *    <li><js>"property=2011-01"</js> - A single month
034 *    <li><js>"property=2011-01-01"</js> - A single day
035 *    <li><js>"property=2011-01-01T12"</js> - A single hour
036 *    <li><js>"property=2011-01-01T12:30"</js> - A single minute
037 *    <li><js>"property=2011-01-01T12:30:45"</js> - A single second
038 *    <li><js>"property=&gt;2011"</js>,<js>"property=&gt;=2011"</js>,<js>"property=&lt;2011"</js>,<js>"property=&lt;=2011"</js> - Open-ended ranges
039 *    <li><js>"property=&gt;2011"</js>,<js>"property=&gt;=2011"</js>,<js>"property=&lt;2011"</js>,<js>"property=&lt;=2011"</js> - Open-ended ranges
040 *    <li><js>"property=2011 - 2013-06-30"</js> - Closed ranges
041 * </ul>
042 *
043 * <ul class='seealso'>
044 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-marshall.jm.ObjectTools">Overview &gt; juneau-marshall &gt; Object Tools</a>
045 * </ul>
046 */
047public class TimeMatcherFactory extends MatcherFactory {
048
049   /**
050    * Default reusable matcher.
051    */
052   public static final TimeMatcherFactory DEFAULT = new TimeMatcherFactory();
053
054   private final SimpleDateFormat[] formats;
055
056   /**
057    * Constructor.
058    */
059   protected TimeMatcherFactory() {
060      this.formats = getTimestampFormats();
061   }
062
063   /**
064    * TODO
065    *
066    * @return TODO
067    */
068   protected SimpleDateFormat[] getTimestampFormats() {
069      String[] s = getTimestampFormatStrings();
070      SimpleDateFormat[] a = new SimpleDateFormat[s.length];
071      for (int i = 0; i < s.length; i++)
072         a[i] = new SimpleDateFormat(s[i]);
073      return a;
074   }
075
076   /**
077    * TODO
078    *
079    * @return TODO
080    */
081   protected String[] getTimestampFormatStrings() {
082      return new String[]{
083         "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss",
084         "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm",
085         "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH",
086         "yyyy-MM-dd",
087         "yyyy-MM",
088         "yyyy"
089      };
090   }
091
092   @Override
093   public boolean canMatch(ClassMeta<?> cm) {
094      return cm.isDateOrCalendar();
095   }
096
097   @Override
098   public AbstractMatcher create(String pattern) {
099      return new TimeMatcher(formats, pattern);
100   }
101
102   /**
103    * A construct representing a single search pattern.
104    */
105   private static class TimeMatcher extends AbstractMatcher {
106
107      private static final AsciiSet
108         DT = AsciiSet.create("0123456789-:T./"),
109         WS = AsciiSet.create(" \t");
110
111      TimestampRange[] ranges;
112      List<TimestampRange> l = new LinkedList<>();
113
114      public TimeMatcher(SimpleDateFormat[] f, String s) {
115
116         // Possible patterns:
117         // >2000, <2000, >=2000, <=2000, > 2000, 2000 - 2001, '2000', >'2000', '2000'-'2001', '2000' - '2001'
118
119         // Possible states:
120         // S01 = Looking for [<]/[>]/quote/NUM ([>]=S02, [<]=S03, [']=S05, ["]=S06, NUM=S08)
121         // S02 = Found [>], looking for [=]/quote/NUM ([=]=S04, [']=S05, ["]=S06, NUM=S08)
122         // S03 = Found [<], looking for [=]/quote/NUM ([=]=S04, [']=S05, ["]=S06, NUM=S08)
123         // S04 = Found [>=] or [<=], looking for quote/NUM ([']=S05, ["]=S06, NUM=S08)
124         // S05 = Found ['], looking for ['] ([']=S01)
125         // S06 = Found ["], looking for ["] (["]=S01)
126         // S07 = Found [123"] or [123'], looking for WS (WS=S09)
127         // S08 = Found [2], looking for WS (WS=S09)
128         // S09 = Found [2000 ], looking for [-]/quote/NUM ([-]=S10, [']=S11, ["]=S12, NUM=S13)
129         // S10 = Found [2000 -], looking for quote/NUM ([']=S11, ["]=S12, NUM=S13)
130         // S11 = Found [2000 - '], looking for ['] ([']=S01)
131         // S12 = Found [2000 - "], looking for ["] (["]=S01)
132         // S13 = Found [2000 - 2], looking for WS (WS=S01)
133
134         StateMachineState state = S01;
135         int mark = 0;
136         Equality eq = Equality.NONE;
137         String s1 = null, s2 = null;
138
139         int i;
140         char c = 0;
141         for (i = 0; i < s.trim().length(); i++) {
142            c = s.charAt(i);
143            if (state == S01) {
144               // S01 = Looking for [>]/[<]/quote/NUM ([>]=S02, [<]=S03, [']=S05, ["]=S06, NUM=S08)
145               if (WS.contains(c)) {
146                  state = S01;
147               } else if (c == '>') {
148                  state = S02;
149                  eq = Equality.GT;
150               } else if (c == '<') {
151                  state = S03;
152                  eq = Equality.LT;
153               } else if (c == '\'') {
154                  state = S05;
155                  mark = i+1;
156               } else if (c == '"') {
157                  state = S06;
158                  mark = i+1;
159               } else if (DT.contains(c)) {
160                  state = S08;
161                  mark = i;
162               } else {
163                  break;
164               }
165            } else if (state == S02) {
166               // S02 = Found [>], looking for [=]/quote/NUM ([=]=S04, [']=S05, ["]=S06, NUM=S08)
167               if (WS.contains(c)) {
168                  state = S02;
169               } else if (c == '=') {
170                  state = S04;
171                  eq = Equality.GTE;
172               } else if (c == '\'') {
173                  state = S05;
174                  mark = i+1;
175               } else if (c == '"') {
176                  state = S06;
177                  mark = i+1;
178               } else if (DT.contains(c)) {
179                  state = S08;
180                  mark = i;
181               } else {
182                  break;
183               }
184            } else if (state == S03) {
185               // S03 = Found [<], looking for [=]/quote/NUM ([=]=S04, [']=S05, ["]=S06, NUM=S08)
186               if (WS.contains(c)) {
187                  state = S03;
188               } else if (c == '=') {
189                  state = S04;
190                  eq = Equality.LTE;
191               } else if (c == '\'') {
192                  state = S05;
193                  mark = i+1;
194               } else if (c == '"') {
195                  state = S06;
196                  mark = i+1;
197               } else if (DT.contains(c)) {
198                  state = S08;
199                  mark = i;
200               } else {
201                  break;
202               }
203            } else if (state == S04) {
204               // S04 = Found [>=] or [<=], looking for quote/NUM ([']=S05, ["]=S06, NUM=S08)
205               if (WS.contains(c)) {
206                  state = S04;
207               } else if (c == '\'') {
208                  state = S05;
209                  mark = i+1;
210               } else if (c == '"') {
211                  state = S06;
212                  mark = i+1;
213               } else if (DT.contains(c)) {
214                  state = S08;
215                  mark = i;
216               } else {
217                  break;
218               }
219            } else if (state == S05) {
220               // S05 = Found ['], looking for ['] ([']=S07)
221               if (c == '\'') {
222                  state = S07;
223                  s1 = s.substring(mark, i);
224               }
225            } else if (state == S06) {
226               // S06 = Found ["], looking for ["] (["]=S07)
227               if (c == '"') {
228                  state = S07;
229                  s1 = s.substring(mark, i);
230               }
231            } else if (state == S07) {
232               // S07 = Found [123"] or [123'], looking for WS (WS=S09)
233               if (WS.contains(c)) {
234                  state = S09;
235               } else if (c == '-') {
236                  state = S10;
237               } else {
238                  break;
239               }
240            } else if (state == S08) {
241               // S08 = Found [1], looking for WS (WS=S09)
242               if (WS.contains(c)) {
243                  state = S09;
244                  s1 = s.substring(mark, i);
245               }
246            } else if (state == S09) {
247               // S09 = Found [2000 ], looking for [-]/[>]/[<]/quote/NUM ([-]=S10, [>]=S02, [<]=S03, [']=S05, ["]=S06, NUM=S08)
248               if (WS.contains(c)) {
249                  state = S09;
250               } else if (c == '-') {
251                  state = S10;
252               } else if (c == '>') {
253                  state = S02;
254                  l.add(new TimestampRange(f, eq, s1));
255                  eq = Equality.GT;
256                  s1 = null;
257               } else if (c == '<') {
258                  state = S03;
259                  l.add(new TimestampRange(f, eq, s1));
260                  eq = Equality.LT;
261                  s1 = null;
262               } else if (c == '\'') {
263                  state = S05;
264                  l.add(new TimestampRange(f, eq, s1));
265                  mark = i+1;
266                  eq = null;
267                  s1 = null;
268               } else if (c == '"') {
269                  state = S06;
270                  l.add(new TimestampRange(f, eq, s1));
271                  mark = i+1;
272                  eq = null;
273                  s1 = null;
274               } else if (DT.contains(c)) {
275                  state = S08;
276                  l.add(new TimestampRange(f, eq, s1));
277                  eq = null;
278                  s1 = null;
279                  mark = i;
280               } else {
281                  break;
282               }
283            } else if (state == S10) {
284               // S10 = Found [2000 -], looking for quote/NUM ([']=S11, ["]=S12, NUM=S13)
285               if (WS.contains(c)) {
286                  state = S10;
287               } else if (c == '\'') {
288                  state = S11;
289                  mark = i+1;
290               } else if (c == '"') {
291                  state = S12;
292                  mark = i+1;
293               } else if (DT.contains(c)) {
294                  state = S13;
295                  mark = i;
296               } else {
297                  break;
298               }
299            } else if (state == S11) {
300               // S11 = Found [2000 - '], looking for ['] ([']=S01)
301               if (c == '\'') {
302                  state = S01;
303                  s2 = s.substring(mark, i);
304                  l.add(new TimestampRange(f, s1, s2));
305                  s1 = null;
306                  s2 = null;
307               }
308            } else if (state == S12) {
309               // S12 = Found [2000 - "], looking for ["] (["]=S01)
310               if (c == '"') {
311                  state = S01;
312                  s2 = s.substring(mark, i);
313                  l.add(new TimestampRange(f, s1, s2));
314                  s1 = null;
315                  s2 = null;
316               }
317            } else /* (state == S13) */ {
318               // S13 = Found [2000 - 2], looking for WS (WS=S01)
319               if (WS.contains(c)) {
320                  state = S01;
321                  s2 = s.substring(mark, i);
322                  l.add(new TimestampRange(f, s1, s2));
323                  s1 = null;
324                  s2 = null;
325               }
326            }
327         }
328
329         if (i != s.length())
330            throw new PatternException("Invalid range pattern ({0}): pattern=[{1}], pos=[{2}], char=[{3}]", state, s, i, c);
331
332         if (state == S01) {
333            // No tokens found.
334         } else if (state == S02 || state == S03 || state == S04 || state == S05 || state == S06 || state == S10 || state == S11 || state == S12) {
335            throw new PatternException("Invalid range pattern (E{0}): {1}", state, s);
336         } else if (state == S07) {
337            l.add(new TimestampRange(f, eq, s1));
338         } else if (state == S08) {
339            s1 = s.substring(mark).trim();
340            l.add(new TimestampRange(f, eq, s1));
341         } else /* (state == S13) */ {
342            s2 = s.substring(mark).trim();
343            l.add(new TimestampRange(f, s1, s2));
344         }
345
346         ranges = l.toArray(new TimestampRange[l.size()]);
347      }
348
349      @Override
350      public boolean matches(ClassMeta<?> cm, Object o) {
351         if (ranges.length == 0)
352            return true;
353
354         Calendar c = null;
355         if (cm.isCalendar())
356            c = (Calendar)o;
357         else {
358            c = Calendar.getInstance();
359            c.setTime((Date)o);
360         }
361         for (int i = 0; i < ranges.length; i++)
362            if (ranges[i].matches(c))
363               return true;
364         return false;
365      }
366   }
367
368   /**
369    * A construct representing a single search range in a single search pattern.
370    * All possible forms of search patterns are boiled down to these timestamp ranges.
371    */
372   private static class TimestampRange {
373      Calendar start;
374      Calendar end;
375
376      public TimestampRange(SimpleDateFormat[] formats, String start, String end) {
377         CalendarP start1 = parseDate(formats, start);
378         CalendarP end1 = parseDate(formats, end);
379         this.start = start1.copy().roll(MILLISECOND, -1).getCalendar();
380         this.end = end1.roll(1).getCalendar();
381      }
382
383      public TimestampRange(SimpleDateFormat[] formats, Equality eq, String singleDate) {
384         CalendarP singleDate1 = parseDate(formats, singleDate);
385         if (eq == Equality.GT) {
386            this.start = singleDate1.roll(1).roll(MILLISECOND, -1).getCalendar();
387            this.end = new CalendarP(new Date(Long.MAX_VALUE), 0).getCalendar();
388         } else if (eq == Equality.LT) {
389            this.start = new CalendarP(new Date(0), 0).getCalendar();
390            this.end = singleDate1.getCalendar();
391         } else if (eq == Equality.GTE) {
392            this.start = singleDate1.roll(MILLISECOND, -1).getCalendar();
393            this.end = new CalendarP(new Date(Long.MAX_VALUE), 0).getCalendar();
394         } else if (eq == Equality.LTE) {
395            this.start = new CalendarP(new Date(0), 0).getCalendar();
396            this.end = singleDate1.roll(1).getCalendar();
397         } else {
398            this.start = singleDate1.copy().roll(MILLISECOND, -1).getCalendar();
399            this.end = singleDate1.roll(1).getCalendar();
400         }
401      }
402
403      public boolean matches(Calendar c) {
404         boolean b = (c.after(start) && c.before(end));
405         return b;
406      }
407   }
408
409   private static int getPrecisionField(String pattern) {
410      if (pattern.indexOf('s') != -1)
411         return SECOND;
412      if (pattern.indexOf('m') != -1)
413         return MINUTE;
414      if (pattern.indexOf('H') != -1)
415         return HOUR_OF_DAY;
416      if (pattern.indexOf('d') != -1)
417         return DAY_OF_MONTH;
418      if (pattern.indexOf('M') != -1)
419         return MONTH;
420      if (pattern.indexOf('y') != -1)
421         return YEAR;
422      return Calendar.MILLISECOND;
423   }
424
425   /**
426    * Parses a timestamp string off the beginning of the string segment 'seg'.
427    * Goes through each possible valid timestamp format until it finds a match.
428    * The position where the parsing left off is stored in pp.
429    *
430    * @param seg The string segment being parsed.
431    * @param pp Where parsing last left off.
432    * @return An object representing a timestamp.
433    */
434   static CalendarP parseDate(SimpleDateFormat[] formats, String seg) {
435      ParsePosition pp = new ParsePosition(0);
436      for (int i = 0; i < formats.length; i++) {
437         SimpleDateFormat f = formats[i];
438         Date d = f.parse(seg, pp);
439         int idx = pp.getIndex();
440         if (idx != 0) {
441            // it only counts if the next character is '-', 'space', or end-of-string.
442            char c = (seg.length() == idx ? 0 : seg.charAt(idx));
443            if (c == 0 || c == '-' || Character.isWhitespace(c))
444               return new CalendarP(d, getPrecisionField(f.toPattern()));
445         }
446      }
447
448      throw new BasicRuntimeException("Invalid date encountered:  ''{0}''", seg);
449   }
450
451   /**
452    * Combines a Calendar with a precision identifier.
453    */
454   private static class CalendarP {
455      public Calendar c;
456      public int precision;
457
458      public CalendarP(Date date, int precision) {
459         c = Calendar.getInstance();
460         c.setTime(date);
461         this.precision = precision;
462      }
463
464      public CalendarP copy() {
465         return new CalendarP(c.getTime(), precision);
466      }
467
468      public CalendarP roll(int field, int amount) {
469         c.add(field, amount);
470         return this;
471      }
472
473      public CalendarP roll(int amount) {
474         return roll(precision, amount);
475      }
476
477      public Calendar getCalendar() {
478         return c;
479      }
480   }
481}
